description:
Mirai and crew arrive at the hot springs located near the border of the Land of Fire and the Land of Steam in time for a festival celebrating dogs and cats. But Mirai—always on the job—just can’t relax!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ninja-Chroniken der Dampfwolke: Der Hunde-Katzen-Krieg!
The Steam Ninja Scrolls: The Dog and Cat War!
Yukemuri Ninpocho. ¡Guerra de perros y gatos!
لفائف نينجا البخار: حرب الكلب والقط!
湯煙忍法帖・犬猫戦争!!
